org.glassfish.ejb.persistent.timer

Interface TimerLocal

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TimerBean

    public interface TimerLocal
    Local view of the persistent representation of an EJB timer.
    Author:
    Kenneth Saks, Marina Vatkina
